extension.summary: Replay Football Matches From Around The World
extension.description: Full Match Replay brings you football matches from around the world including the Premier League, Seria A, La Liga, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, Champions League, Europa League, EURO, UEFA Nations League, World Cup, Copa America and the Africa Cup.
